room_title: Escape room "Who Stole Christmas?" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: I went here with some co-workers and we had a fantastic time. Miles was great instructor. I would definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Who Stole Christmas?" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: We were really impressed with the professionalism and customer service of this business. We booked it for our company Christmas party and it couldn't have gone better!! Everyone had a blast! The people that handled our group were really nice and fun and helped keep the excitement and energy going. For anyone looking for GREAT team building experience, this is the perfect thing to do!

room_title: Escape room "Who Stole Christmas?" by Paranoia Quest in Atlanta
review: So much fun!!! Ready felt like an adventure. .. the riddles are cool and it's really amazing making it through the course. I would definitely do this again!
